today.title: Breakfast
today.description: A nourishing breakfast sets the tone for a productive day.

today.title: Lunch
today.description: A time to nourish not only the body but also the spirit.

today.title: Dinner
today.description: Feast your eyes on this delicious dinner spread.

ChineseCuisine.name: Spring Rolls
ChineseCuisine.description: Crispy rolls filled with a mix of vegetables and chicken, served with a side of chutney. Enjoy three delicious rolls in each serving.

ChineseCuisine.name: Fried Rice
ChineseCuisine.description: Stir-fried rice with vegetables, eggs, and your choice of chicken, beef, or shrimp.

ChineseCuisine.name: Chicken Manchurian
ChineseCuisine.description: Chicken pieces cooked in a tangy, spicy sauce with vegetables.

ChineseCuisine.name: Chinese Rice
ChineseCuisine.description: Stir-fried rice with vegetables and a hint of soy sauce.

DesiCuisine.name: Chicken Biryani
DesiCuisine.description: Fragrant rice dish with chicken and spices, served with a side of chutney

DesiCuisine.name: Palak Alu
DesiCuisine.description: One Plate spinach and potatoes cooked with spices, served with two soft rotis.

DesiCuisine.name: Chicken Karahi
DesiCuisine.description: One Plate spicy chicken curry cooked in a wok-like pan with tomatoes and green chilies, served with two soft khameeri rotis.

DesiCuisine.name: Beef Kofta
DesiCuisine.description: One plate spiced beef meatballs in a rich tomato sauce, served with two soft rotis.

DesiCuisine.name: Alu Paratha
DesiCuisine.description: Flatbread stuffed with spiced mashed potatoes.

Desserts.name: Gulab Jamun
Desserts.description: Deep-fried dough balls soaked in a sweet syrup flavored with rose water and cardamom.

Desserts.name: Chocolate Lava Cake
Desserts.description: Piece of rich chocolate cake with a gooey molten center, served with vanilla ice cream.

Desserts.name: Ras Malai
Desserts.description: serving bowl of delicate ras malai with soft, spongy cheese dumplings soaked in a creamy, flavored milk syrup.

Desserts.name: Kheer
Desserts.description: serving bowl creamy rice pudding flavored with cardamom and topped with nuts.

Desserts.name: Sheer Khurma
Desserts.description: serving bowl of rich and creamy vermicelli pudding flavored with cardamom, saffron, and garnished with nuts and dried fruits.

Juices.name: Mango Shake
Juices.description: Refreshing juice made from ripe mangoes.

Juices.name: Milo
Juices.description: Chocolate malt beverage with a rich, creamy texture, perfect for a refreshing treat.

Juices.name: Banana Shake
Juices.description: Creamy and refreshing shake made with ripe bananas blended to perfection.
